name: European Community Association of Shipbrokers and Agents
membership: The International Maritime Organisation, The World Customs Organisation, UNICITRAL, UNCTAD, The Comite Maritime International, The Global Partnership for Sustainable Transport, The Baltic Exchange, BIMCO, INTERCARGO, INTERTANKO, the International Port Community Systems Association, the Maritime Anti-Corruption Network Cross Industry Working Group
goal: Promoting and protecting the interests of ship brokers and ship agents worldwide.
interests: Climate Action, Customs, Environment, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Customs, maritime policy, port policy, environmental issues, e-maritime, short sea shipping, border controls (including health and phytosanitary protection, immigration controls - Schengen Agreement), environmental issues affecting shipping and ports.
